It is clear that DoD's current approach is not working and we need far more vigorous enforcement to protect taxpayers from massive fraud, Sen. Bernie Sanders said. ( AFP)- Cuban dissident Guillermo Farinas, the 2010 Sakharov rights prize winner, has been arrested and police are holding him in the central city of Santa Clara, his mother and dissidents said. I spoke with him, and he told me that he is under arrest in the third police unit in Santa Clara, and then he hung up, his mother Alicia Hernandez said by phone from the city located some 240 kilometers( 150 miles) east of Havana. That said, Steve Ballmer highlights more-important qualities: Satya Nadella is also well-known for his leadership. He has strong collaboration skills, is decisive in both decision-making and delegating and has strong customer insights, engineering and business expertise. He also knows how to structure organizations for outstanding performance. Decisiveness and action-taking will be important. Revenue from YouTube doubled during the year and 300,000 Android phones are activated each day, Google noted. But Google still is heavily dependent on search, and this may be why Page is succeeding Eric Schmidt . One of the things missing from Google's strategy has been the social component, I think that possibly the ability to move on a major social networking strategy may more easily come from a younger CEO, said Allen Weiner , research vice president at Gartner.
